title: Quick Question about MMR
body: Assuming you have been losing MMR from playing solo, if you duo with someone in the same division as you but with drastically higher mmr.. Can that help to raise your mmr faster if you win together? Or will your MMR raise at the same pace as if you were winning in solo? I imagine it would go faster since you'd be playing with and against higher MMR players, but am looking for a discussion about this. Thanks in advance!

replies.body: I would assume with the was this new dynamic queue is that it would continue to raise quite similar to if you were solo.
